text: <https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S2590174519300157> -- Aluminion RedOx cycle as an energy store. If my math isn't off, the ~500kg/apartment stated in the paper would be a cube of ~60cm per side. This doesn't feel correct, where is the catch?
